product_name: Patagonia Retro-X Fleece Jacket - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Retro-X fleece jacket for boys takes both the wind and the chill out of windchill and has a cool retro look. Cozy quarter-inch pile recycled polyester fleece has a windproof nylon lining that blocks windchill. Full-length zipper is backed by a storm flap; handwarmer and chest pockets are zippered. Stand-up collar adds even more protection from cold breezes. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Retro-X fleece jacket for boys takes both the wind and the chill out of windchill and has a cool retro look.
